attributes.action: Condemn the use of excessive force and state-sanctioned violence against peaceful protesters in Turkey
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon parliament to officially condemn the use of excessive force by security forces in Turkey during peaceful protests across the country.

 We also call upon parliament to recognise and condemn the use of state-sanctioned violence against Turkish citizens and strongly urge the Turkish government to act now to prevent any further inuries and deaths.
